Social Networks Management Module¶

Module that manage the interaction (other than authentication) with other social networks, via some custom wrappers that uses REST API calls to interact with the corresponding social networks

OAuthClient¶

exception app_socialnetworks.oauthclient.ClearanceException¶

Exception thrown if the user try to modify resources he doesn’t own

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

exception app_socialnetworks.oauthclient.NotConnectedException¶

Exception thrown if the user try to access a social network not connected to his profile

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

class app_socialnetworks.oauthclient.OauthClient(CONSUMER_KEY, CONSUMER_SECRET)¶

Abstract wrapper to be specialized for each social network

Consumer :oauth2 consumer object
Oauth_token :public part of the oauth token
Oauth_token_secret :
 secret part of the oauth token
Token :oauth2 token object
Client :oauth2 authenticated client
__init__(CONSUMER_KEY, CONSUMER_SECRET)¶
Instantiate the client by
  1. obtain an access token using the CONSUMER_KEY and CONSUMER_SECRET provided
  2. instantiate a client authenticated with the token previously generated
Parameters:
  • CONSUMER_KEY – consumer key of the social network’s app
  • CONSUMER_SECRET – consumer secret of the social network’s app
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

encode_multipart_formdata(fields, files)¶

Prepare a POST message with a body containing a media content

Note

Needed by Flickr API

oauth_gen(method, url, iparams, headers)¶

Creates the oauth parameters needed to sign the body

oauth_sig(method, uri, params)¶

Creates a valid OAuth signature

exception app_socialnetworks.oauthclient.UploadException¶

Exception thrown if some error occur during the upload of media content to a social network

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

Flickr¶

class app_socialnetworks.flickr.FlickrClient(photoset, user_auth=False, auth=False)¶

Wrapper for Flickr APIs

Consumer_key :Flickr App ID
Consumer_secret :
 Flickr API Secret
Photoset :the connected Flickr photoset, if any
User_auth :account of the user on Showcase
Auth :boolean flag (if True, the operation needs to be authenticated)

See also

app_socialnetworks.oauthclient.OauthClient

__init__(photoset, user_auth=False, auth=False)¶

Insantiate the client: if authentication is needed, proceed with Oauth; otherwise, use a simple HTTP client

Parameters:
  • photoset (string) – the connected Flickr photoset, if any
  • user_auth (User) – account of the user on Showcase
  • auth (boolean) – flag (if True, the operation needs to be authenticated)
add_photo_to_photoset(pid)¶

After uploading a photo to Flickr, add it to the photoset

Parameters:pid (string) – pid of the newly uploaded photo
get_photo(photo)¶

Get url of a specific photo

Parameters:photo – Flickr photo
Type :object
get_photolist(limit)¶

Get a list of photos contained in the photoset

Parameters:limit (int) – max number of photos to retrieve
request_token(consumer)¶

Retrieve the access token of the user from his connected accounts data

upload_photo(title, description, photo)¶

Upload a photo to Flickr

Parameters:
  • title (string) – title of the photo
  • description (string) – description of the photo
  • photo (image file) – photo to upload

Gravatar¶

class app_socialnetworks.gravatar.GravatarClient(email)¶

Wrapper for Gravatar APIs

Email :email of the user

See also

app_socialnetworks.oauthclient.OauthClient

get_gravatar_url()¶

Retrieve the gravatar associated to the user email

LinkedIn¶

class app_socialnetworks.linkedin.LinkedInClient(user_auth)¶

Wrapper for LinkedIn APIs

Consumer_key :LinkedIn App ID
Consumer_secret :
 LinkedIn API Secret
User_auth :account of the user on Showcase

See also

app_socialnetworks.oauthclient.OauthClient

__init__(user_auth)¶

Insantiate the oauth client

Parameters:user_auth (User) – account of the user on Showcase
get_consumer_key()¶

Getter for the CONSUMER_KEY

get_employment_data()¶

Get employment data from LinkedIn: - headline - industry - company - title

request_token(consumer)¶

Retrieve the access token of the user from his connected accounts data

skills()¶

Get skills from LinkedIn

Tumblr¶

class app_socialnetworks.tumblr.TumblrClient(blog, user_auth=False, auth=False)¶

Wrapper for Tumblr APIs

Consumer_key :Tumblr App ID
Consumer_secret :
 Tumblr API Secret
Blog :the connected Tumblr blog, if any
User_auth :account of the user on Showcase
Auth :boolean flag (if True, the operation needs to be authenticated)

See also

app_socialnetworks.oauthclient.OauthClient

__init__(blog, user_auth=False, auth=False)¶

Insantiate the client: if authentication is needed, proceed with Oauth; otherwise, use a simple HTTP client

Parameters:
  • blog (string) – the connected Tumblr blog, if any
  • user_auth (User) – account of the user on Showcase
  • auth (boolean) – flag (if True, the operation needs to be authenticated)
add_audio(source)¶

Add a blog of type: audio

Parameters:source (string) – url of the audio file to publish
add_chat(title, conversation)¶

Add a blog of type: chat

Parameters:
  • title (string) – title of the blog post
  • conversation (string) – conversation to publish
add_link(title, url)¶

Add a blog of type: link

Parameters:
  • title (string) – title of the blog post
  • url (string) – url of the link to publish
add_photo(source, photo)¶

Add a blog of type: photo

Parameters:
  • source (string) – url of the photo to publish, if any
  • photo (image file) – photo to upload, if any
add_quote(quote)¶

Add a blog of type: quote

Parameters:quote (string) – quote to publish
add_text(title, body)¶

Add a blog of type: text

Parameters:
  • title (string) – title of the blog post
  • body (string) – content of the blog post
get_blog_info()¶

Get general infos about the connected blog

get_blog_posts()¶

Fetch last 5 blog posts

request_token(consumer)¶

Retrieve the access token of the user from his connected accounts data
